about.content: My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user-friendly but at the same time attractive. Moreover, I add personal touch to your product and make sure that is eye-catching and easy to use. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. I created web design for many famous brand companies.

education.title: Keio University
education.content: 理工学部 物理情報工学科に在籍。学部3年の12月から渡辺研究室に所属。
